title: What is the Doha tennis schedule?
description: The final day has arrived at the Qatar ExxonMobil Open with the title on the line on Saturday. The 2020 champion Andrey Rublev will look to clinch his first tour-level title of the season against Jack Draper, who is competing in his first Doha final and chasing his third ATP Tour title. Fourth seed Rublev leads Draper 3-0 in the pair's Lexus ATP Head2Head series. The duo last squared off at the 2023 US Open. The singles final will follow the doubles final at the ATP 500 event. View the full Saturday schedule below. ORDER OF PLAY - SATURDAY, 22 FEBRUARY 2025 Center Court - start 3:00 PM Starts At 3:00 PM Doubles Final - Julian Cash (GBR) / Lloyd Glasspool (GBR) vs Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR) Not Before 6:00 PM Singles Final - [8] Jack Draper (GBR) vs [5] Andrey Rublev [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Andrey Rublev, Felix Auger-Aliassime, Jiri Lehecka and Jack Draper are in semi-final action in Doha on Friday.

html:
Doha

Rublev to face Draper in the final

February 21, 2025

QTF/Paul Zimmer

By ATP Staff

The final day has arrived at the Qatar ExxonMobil Open with the title on the line on Saturday.

The 2020 champion Andrey Rublev will look to clinch his first tour-level title of the season against Jack Draper, who is competing in his first Doha final and chasing his third ATP Tour title. Fourth seed Rublev leads Draper 3-0 in the pair's Lexus ATP Head2Head series. The duo last squared off at the 2023 US Open. The singles final will follow the doubles final at the ATP 500 event.

View the full Saturday schedule below.

ORDER OF PLAY - SATURDAY, 22 FEBRUARY 2025

Center Court - start 3:00 PM
Starts At 3:00 PM
Doubles Final - Julian Cash (GBR) / Lloyd Glasspool (GBR) vs Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR)

Not Before 6:00 PM
Singles Final - [8] Jack Draper (GBR) vs [5] Andrey Rublev
